so_14935165: while IFS= read -r line; do
    id="F"
    if [[ "$line" =~ /Recordings/ ]]; then

        segment=$(echo $line | grep -o "$id.*" | cut -d '.' -f1-2)
        echo "$segment"
    fi
done < file.txt
